00061    struct Category {
00062 
00063       typedef uint16 CategoryID;
00064 
00065       bool operator < ( const Category& other ) const {
00066          return m_name < other.m_name;
00067       }
00068       bool operator != ( const Category& cat ) const {
00069          return ! ( *this == cat );
00070       }
00071 
00072       bool operator == ( const Category& cat ) const {
00073          return cat.m_name == m_name;
00074       }
00075 
00076       CategoryID getCategoryID() const { return m_categoryID; }
00077       StringTable::stringCode getStringCode() const { return m_stringcode; }
00078 
00080       MC2String m_name; 
00082       StringTable::stringCode m_stringcode;
00084       CategoryID m_categoryID; 
00085    };
